snippet: A leveraged buyout of Best Buy would be a tall order for any private equity firm, even with the founder willing to roll over $1 billion of his holdings. But here's how Richard Schulze might try to buy the retailer.
abstract: A leveraged buyout of Best Buy would be a tall order for any private equity firm, even with the founder willing to roll over $1 billion of his holdings. But here's how Richard Schulze might try to buy the retailer.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: How a Best Buy Takeover Might Work
